title: WTB T204's EX and up SGC/PSA
author: sb1

posts.post_title: WTB T204's EX and up SGC/PSA
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or will trade for T204 Ramly cards in higher grade, really looking for 6's, 7's or 8's. But will consider nice 5's as well. Please PM with anything you might want to sell or trade. Have Ramly dupes as well. SGC or PSA preferred.

Scott
